title: The Genius Mage Who Uses His Fists

summary: The Genius Mage Who Uses His Fists Manhwa World Champion Fighter ‘Kim Jin-ho’ Wakes Up in the Body of the Wizard ‘Zed Arahan’! Warriors fight up close, while wizards attack from a distance. A genius who breaks the unchanging law has appeared.
